vclaim: A supercomputer called "Hammer" and a software program called "Scorecard" are being used to alter vote counts in the U.S. presidential election of 2020.
title: Is There a ‘Hammer and Scorecard’ Operation to Manipulate Vote Counts?
subtitle: The director of the U.S. Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA) called the rumors "nonsense."
author: Dan Evon
